Text: The .sub file is missing so with only .idx file the subtittle will not work.
The subtitles will play with Media Player Classic if only idx available.
@henshaw666: No, the idx file contains only timecodes while the subtitles itself are saved in the sub file. But it seems as if TvTeam doesn't want understand this since all releases lack sub files.
@isbarn yeh don't know what i was thinking, glad you have found some decent subbies, i was just gonna have look for some. thanks.
